title: API in NodeJs with Express
description: Bienvenue dans ce cours sur les API.

body.raw:
Create an API in NodeJs

Tutorial Basic
## Install Express ```sh mkdir api-node cd api-node npm init -y npm install express ``` ### Basic API code in NodeJs ```js const express = require('express'); const app = express(); app.use(express.json()); let articles = [{ id: 1, title: 'Node API', content: 'Introduction Ã  Express' }]; app.get('/articles', (req, res) => { res.json(articles); }); app.post('/articles', (req, res) => { const newArticle = req.body; articles.push(newArticle); res.status(201).json(newArticle); }); app.listen(3000, () => { console.log('Server running on http://localhost:3000'); }); ```
### API in NodeJs Build API with NodeJs ### API in PHP The marketing site with landing pages. ### API in Golang The dashboard with auth and subscriptions. ### API in Python The blog built using Contentlayer and MDX. ### API in TypeScript The blog built using Contentlayer and MDX.
